actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-367.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance for routine purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Finance to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the 93rd Congress, $20,000 for investigatory purposes specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance for routine purposes.
